dct_title_s: GLOBVS TERRAQVEVS ECCLESIASTICO POLITICVS IN SVAS PARTES ET DOMINIA DIVISVS
dct_description_sm: Displays influence of Christian theology in addition to known geography.
Personifications of "EVROPA.", "AFRICA.", "AMERICA", and "ASIA" hold maps of their areas, and surround a central globe showing Eastern Hemisphere. Title is on ribbon surrounding and below the globe.
California shown as relatively large island on "America" map (lower right).
Text near page top: "IN MANU EIVS SVNT OMNES FINES TERRE. Psalm 94."

From: Tabellæ geographicæ. Hoc est: regionum, provinciarum locorumque memorabilium in orbe terrarum succincta dispositio et ordo politico-geo-graphicus. Authore P. Henrico Scherer, Societatis Jesu. Pars VI. Sumptibus Joannis Caspari Bencard, Bibliopolæ Academiæ. Monarchii, Typis, Mariæ Magdalenæ Rauchin Viduæ, Anno M.DCCIII. : Atlas Novus exhibens orbem terraqueum per naturæ opera, historiæ novæ ac veteris monumenta, artisque geographicæ leges et præcepta. Hoc est: Geographic universa in septem partes contracta, et instructa ducentis fere chartis geographicis, ac figuris, cujus: Pars VI ... Tabellæ geographicæ. 7 parts (pars) published 1702-10; reissued 1730-37.
